cards.name: Aesthir Glider
cards.text:
Flying
Aesthir Glider can't block.
cards.flavor:
"Sacrilege A noble ally in life, made nothing more than a glorified kite in death"
—Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

cards.name: Aesthir Glider
cards.text:
Flying
Aesthir Glider can't block.
cards.flavor:
"A fine example of the rewards of artifice: a thoroughly obedient steed with wings of Soldevi steel."
—Arcum Dagsson,
Soldevi Machinist

cards.name: Agent of Stromgald
cards.text: {R}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"The Order of Stromgald spreads its poisonous lies from within Varchild's troops, and still she sees only visions of conquest."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

cards.name: Agent of Stromgald
cards.text: {R}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"The ‘fabled' Order of Stromgald is cast to the four winds, lost for all time. I, for one, give them no thought."
—General Varchild

cards.name: Arcane Denial
cards.text:
Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

cards.name: Arcane Denial
cards.text:
Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

cards.name: Ashnod's Cylix
cards.text: {3}, {T}: Target player looks at the top three cards of his or her library, puts one of them back on top of his or her library, then exiles the rest.
cards.flavor: Few remember that Ashnod's defilement of Terisiare's resources outstripped even that of her peers.

cards.name: Astrolabe
cards.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Astrolabe: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

cards.name: Astrolabe
cards.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Astrolabe: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

cards.name: Awesome Presence
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked unless defending player pays {3} for each creature he or she controls that's blocking it.
cards.flavor:
"At the core of all power is raw passion."Gerda Äagesdotter,
Archmage of the Unseen

cards.name: Awesome Presence
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked unless defending player pays {3} for each creature he or she controls that's blocking it.
cards.flavor:
"I shape my weapons from the fears of my enemies."
—Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

cards.name: Balduvian Dead
cards.text: {2}{R}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Put a 3/1 black and red Graveborn creature token with haste onto the battlefield. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Balduvian Horde
cards.text: When Balduvian Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.
cards.flavor:
"Peace will come only when we have taken Varchild's head."
—Lovisa Coldeyes,
Balduvian Chieftain

cards.name: Balduvian Trading Post
cards.text:
If Balduvian Trading Post would enter the battlefield, sacrifice an untapped Mountain instead. If you do, put Balduvian Trading Post onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard.
{T}: Add {1}{R} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Balduvian Trading Post deals 1 damage to target attacking creature.

cards.name: Balduvian War-Makers
cards.text:
Haste
Rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
cards.flavor:
"Those mewling Barbarians will cower before my righteous steel"
—General Varchild

cards.name: Balduvian War-Makers
cards.text:
Haste
Rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
cards.flavor: "We send our best to battle, but every man, woman, and child will stand against Varchild's butchers."Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

cards.name: Benthic Explorers
cards.text: {T}, Untap a tapped land an opponent controls: Add one mana of any type that land could produce to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: The rising oceans brought new lakes—and new terrors—to Terisiare. The Explorers found their ancient enemies spawning everywhere.

cards.name: Benthic Explorers
cards.text: {T}, Untap a tapped land an opponent controls: Add one mana of any type that land could produce to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Distant Atlantis charged these Explorers with the task of venturing into unknown waters to track the despised Viscerids.

cards.name: Bestial Fury
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Bestial Fury enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
Whenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, it gets +4/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Bestial Fury
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Bestial Fury enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
Whenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, it gets +4/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Bounty of the Hunt
cards.text:
You may exile a green card from your hand rather than pay Bounty of the Hunt's mana cost.
Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures. For each +1/+1 counter you put on a creature this way, remove a +1/+1 counter from that creature at the beginning of the next cleanup step.

cards.name: Browse
cards.text: {2}{U}{U}: Look at the top five cards of your library, put one of them into your hand, and exile the rest.
cards.flavor:
"Once great literature—now great litter."
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

cards.name: Burnout
cards.text:
Counter target instant spell if it's blue.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
cards.flavor:
"GOTCHA!"
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

cards.name: Carrier Pigeons
cards.text:
Flying
When Carrier Pigeons enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
cards.flavor:
"Birds know no borders Why, then, should we?"
—General Varchild, in a missive to King Darien of Kjeldor

cards.name: Carrier Pigeons
cards.text:
Flying
When Carrier Pigeons enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
cards.flavor: "It's true I ask no fealty of the flocks—but surely we are more than mere beasts."King Darien of Kjeldor, in a missive to General Varchild

cards.name: Casting of Bones
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, draw three cards, then discard one of them.
cards.flavor:
"Only a necromancer would create such a foul form of divination."
—Gerda Äagesdotter,
Archmage of the Unseen

cards.name: Casting of Bones
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, draw three cards, then discard one of them.
cards.flavor:
"Whether whole or not, still we serve Lim-Dûl's wishes."
—Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

cards.name: Chaos Harlequin
cards.text: {R}: Exile the top card of your library. If that card is a land card, Chaos Harlequin gets -4/-0 until end of turn. Otherwise, Chaos Harlequin gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Contagion
cards.text:
You may pay 1 life and exile a black card from your hand rather than pay Contagion's mana cost.
Distribute two -2/-1 counters among one or two target creatures.

cards.name: Deadly Insect
cards.text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor:
"Beautiful, indeed—but one sting could fell a Giant in a heartbeat."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko,
Elvish Hunter

cards.name: Deadly Insect
cards.text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor:
"There is no time for pain when this beast leaves its terrible sting."
—Jaeuhl Carthalion,
Juniper Order Advocate

cards.name: Death Spark
cards.text:
Death Spark deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Death Spark is in your graveyard with a creature card directly above it, you may pay {1}. If you do, return Death Spark to your hand.

cards.name: Diminishing Returns
cards.text: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library. You exile the top ten cards of your library. Then each player draws up to seven cards.

cards.name: Diseased Vermin
cards.text:
Whenever Diseased Vermin deals combat damage to a player, put an infection counter on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, Diseased Vermin deals X damage to target opponent previously dealt damage by it, where X is the number of infection counters on it.

cards.name: Dystopia
cards.text:
Cumulative upkeep—Pay 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a green or white permanent.

cards.name: Elvish Bard
cards.text: All creatures able to block Elvish Bard do so.

cards.name: Elvish Ranger
cards.flavor:
"No one may fault an Elvish Ranger's heart, but the simplest frailty may fell even the proudest warrior."
—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

cards.name: Elvish Ranger
cards.flavor:
"How can any Human hope to match our skills? We are children of Fyndhorn, and its sap runs in our veins."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko,
Elvish Hunter

cards.name: Elvish Spirit Guide
cards.text: Exile Elvish Spirit Guide from your hand: Add {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"We are never without guidance, if we but seek it."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

cards.name: Energy Arc
cards.text: Untap any number of target creatures. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by those creatures this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Relent, and you may transcend your situation."
—Gerda Äagesdotter,
Archmage of the Unseen

cards.name: Enslaved Scout
cards.text: {2}: Enslaved Scout gains mountainwalk until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Her soldiers' hatred for the Goblins is tempered only by their need for what the Goblins alone hold: knowledge of their mountain home."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

cards.name: Enslaved Scout
cards.text: {2}: Enslaved Scout gains mountainwalk until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Even the basest creatures may serve a purpose. Still, their lives need be only as long as the paths we tread."
—General Varchild

cards.name: Errand of Duty
cards.text: Put a 1/1 white Knight creature token with banding onto the battlefield. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
cards.flavor:
"Call every able sword to our side. Kjeldor will stand triumphant"
—King Darien of Kjeldor

cards.name: Errand of Duty
cards.text: Put a 1/1 white Knight creature token with banding onto the battlefield. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
cards.flavor:

• Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:

Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
cards.flavor:

—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

{T}: Exile a card from your hand face down. You may look at it for as long as it remains exiled.

"If they can't take the hail, they'd better stay home."
—Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

cards.text: {X}, {T}: Target opponent puts cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard until a creature card or X cards are put into that graveyard this way, whichever comes first. If a creature card is put into that graveyard this way, sacrifice Helm of Obedience and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. X can't be 0.

cards.name: Juniper Order Advocate

Juniper Order Advocate

cards.text: Green creatures you control get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: Kaysa speaks as the Elder Druid, but the Yavimaya recognizes only one voice: its own.

cards.name: Keeper of Tresserhorn
cards.text: Whenever Keeper of Tresserhorn attacks and isn't blocked, it assigns no combat damage this turn and defending player loses 2 life.

cards.name: Kjeldoran Escort
cards.text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. cards.name: Kjeldoran Escort
cards.text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
cards.flavor:

cards.name: Lat-Nam's Legacy

cards.text: Shuffle a card from your hand into your library. If you do, draw two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

cards.name: Library of Lat-Nam
cards.text:
An opponent chooses one —
• You draw three cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

cards.text:
First strike

cards.name: Lim-Dûl's High Guard
cards.text:
First strike
{1}{B}: Regenerate Lim-Dûl's High Guard.
cards.flavor:
"Death does not prevent us from service to our absent master. As long as Tresserhorn stands, so shall we."
—Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

cards.name: Lim-Dûl's Paladin
cards.text:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may discard a card. If you don't, sacrifice Lim-Dûl's Paladin and draw a card.
Whenever Lim-Dûl's Paladin becomes blocked, it gets +6/+3 until end of turn.
Whenever Lim-Dûl's Paladin attacks and isn't blocked, it assigns no combat damage to defending player this turn and that player loses 4 life.

cards.name: Lim-Dûl's Vault
cards.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. As many times as you choose, you may pay 1 life, put those cards on the bottom of your library in any order, then look at the top five cards of your library. Then shuffle your library and put the last cards you looked at this way on top of it in any order.

cards.name: Lodestone Bauble
cards.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Lodestone Bauble: Put up to four target basic land cards from a player's graveyard on top of his or her library in any order. That player draws a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

cards.name: Lord of Tresserhorn
cards.text:
When Lord of Tresserhorn enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life, you sacrifice two creatures, and target opponent draws two cards.
{B}: Regenerate Lord of Tresserhorn.

cards.name: Martyrdom
cards.text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains "{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn is dealt to this creature instead." Only you may activate this ability.
cards.flavor:
"Martyrs are cheaper than mercenaries, and a far better investment."
—General Varchild

cards.name: Martyrdom
cards.text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains "{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn is dealt to this creature instead." Only you may activate this ability.
cards.flavor:
"The only true immortality is in dying for a cause."
—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

cards.name: Misfortune
cards.text:
An opponent chooses one —
• You put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and gain 4 life.
• You put a -1/-1 counter on each creature that player controls and Misfortune deals 4 damage to him or her.

cards.name: Mishra's Groundbreaker
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Mishra's Groundbreaker: Target land becomes a 3/3 artifact creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
cards.flavor: The very ground yielded to Mishra's wishes.

cards.name: Misinformation
cards.text: Put up to three target cards from an opponent's graveyard on top of his or her library in any order.
cards.flavor: "When you cannot rely on your sources, trust your own senses. When you cannot trust those, you must follow your instincts." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

cards.name: Mystic Compass
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"And I say north is where I want it to be!"
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

cards.name: Nature's Blessing
cards.text: {G}{W}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature or that creature gains banding, first strike, or trample. (This effect lasts indefinitely. Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
cards.flavor:
"Be open to the blessings, whatever their form."
 —Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

cards.name: Nature's Chosen
cards.text:
Enchant creature you control
{0}: Untap enchanted creature. Activate this ability only during your turn and only once each turn.
Tap enchanted creature: Untap target artifact, creature, or land. Activate this ability only if enchanted creature is white and is untapped and only once each turn.

cards.name: Nature's Wrath
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nature's Wrath unless you pay {G}.
Whenever a player puts an Island or blue permanent onto the battlefield, he or she sacrifices an Island or blue permanent.
Whenever a player puts a Swamp or black permanent onto the battlefield, he or she sacrifices a Swamp or black permanent.

cards.name: Noble Steeds
cards.text: {1}{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Only an animal born in the wild has sufficient heart to be a true Knight's steed."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

cards.name: Noble Steeds
cards.text: {1}{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"They are fighters as fine as any Knight they carry."

cards.name: Omen of Fire
cards.text:
Return all Islands to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Phantasmal Fiend

{B}: Phantasmal Fiend gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Phantasmal Fiend
cards.text:
{B}: Phantasmal Fiend gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

Flying

When Phantasmal Sphere leaves the battlefield, target opponent puts a blue Orb creature token with flying onto the battlefield. That creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on Phantasmal Sphere.

cards.name: Phelddagrif

cards.name: Phyrexian Boon

Enchant creature

"Phyrexia's touch is painful to all but the blackest of hearts."

Archmage of the Unseen

cards.name: Phyrexian Boon
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 as long as it's black. Otherwise, it gets -1/-2.
cards.flavor:
"Dagsson should have paid attention to the lessons of Phyrexia before attempting to create a mechanical utopia."
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

cards.name: Phyrexian Devourer
cards.text:
When Phyrexian Devourer's power is 7 or greater, sacrifice it.
Exile the top card of your library: Put X +1/+1 counters on Phyrexian Devourer, where X is the exiled card's converted mana cost.

cards.name: Phyrexian Portal
cards.text: {3}: If your library has ten or more cards in it, target opponent looks at the top ten cards of your library and separates them into two face-down piles. Exile one of those piles. Search the other pile for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle the rest of that pile into your library.

cards.name: Phyrexian War Beast
cards.text: When Phyrexian War Beast leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a land and Phyrexian War Beast deals 1 damage to you.
cards.flavor:
"Deal with the spawn of Phyrexia cautiously; only with time may we control them."
—Arcum Dagsson,
Soldevi Machinist

cards.name: Phyrexian War Beast
cards.text: When Phyrexian War Beast leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a land and Phyrexian War Beast deals 1 damage to you.
cards.flavor:
"Knowing its origins, how could they have thought they could control it?"
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

cards.name: Pillage
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"Were they to reduce us to ash, we would clog their throats and sting their eyes in payment."

Balduvian Chieftain

cards.name: Pyrokinesis
cards.text:
You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay Pyrokinesis's mana cost.

—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

cards.name: Reinforcements
cards.text: Put up to three target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
cards.flavor:
"Let them send their legions I will show them that my truth is stronger than their swords."
—General Varchild

cards.name: Reinforcements
cards.text: Put up to three target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
cards.flavor:
"We aided the Balduvians once before. They need but ask and we shall do so again."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

cards.name: Reprisal
cards.text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"The meek shall fight as one, and they shall overcome even the greatest of foes."
—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

cards.name: Reprisal
cards.text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"Kjeldor's borders are secure, and its citizens are prepared to take up arms in defense of their families."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

cards.name: Ritual of the Machine
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Ritual of the Machine, sacrifice a creature.
Gain control of target nonartifact, nonblack creature.

Flying

cards.name: Royal Decree
cards.text:

cards.name: Royal Herbalist
cards.text: {2}, Exile the top card of your library: You gain 1 life.
cards.flavor:
"Just as an Herbalist heals a wound, so must we heal the rift between Balduvia and Kjeldor."

cards.name: Royal Herbalist
cards.text: {2}, Exile the top card of your library: You gain 1 life.
cards.flavor:

cards.name: Scarab of the Unseen
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Scarab of the Unseen: Return all Auras attached to target permanent you own to their owners' hands. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

cards.name: School of the Unseen
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: After the terrible retribution visited upon Lat-Nam, this school of mages chose to hide from the eyes of the world.

cards.name: Seasoned Tactician

cards.flavor:

cards.name: Shield Sphere

Defender

cards.flavor:
"My Soldiers know that they need never fear for their protection."

cards.name: Sol Grail
cards.text:
As Sol Grail enters the battlefield, choose a color.

cards.flavor: "Look deep into the Grail, and see there what you desire most." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

cards.name: Soldevi Adnate
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice a black or artifact creature: Add to your mana pool an amount of {B} equal to the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost.
cards.flavor:
"People love to follow fools; they don't feel so alone then."
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

cards.name: Soldevi Adnate
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice a black or artifact creature: Add to your mana pool an amount of {B} equal to the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost.
cards.flavor:
"An idiot cannot hear sense, even when a thousand people speak it."
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

cards.name: Soldevi Digger

cards.name: Soldevi Excavations

cards.name: Soldevi Heretic
cards.text: {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Target opponent may draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"In the arms of tragedy, there is little comfort in being right."

cards.name: Soldevi Heretic
cards.text: {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Target opponent may draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"It cannot be Soldev crushed, and my machines to blame?"
—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

cards.name: Soldevi Sage
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice two lands: Draw three cards, then discard one of them.
cards.flavor:
"To hide the truth is more than folly—it is fatal."
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

cards.name: Soldevi Sage
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice two lands: Draw three cards, then discard one of them.
cards.flavor:
"Our underground archives grow daily, as our excavators and sages alike dig to uncover hidden wonders."

Soldevi Machinist

cards.name: Soldevi Sentry
cards.text: {1}: Choose target opponent. Regenerate Soldevi Sentry. When it regenerates this way, that player may draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"A dreadful invention. What ease is there under the watchful eye of cold steel?"

cards.name: Soldevi Sentry
cards.text: {1}: Choose target opponent. Regenerate Soldevi Sentry. When it regenerates this way, that player may draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Our newfound security enables us to turn more of our attentions to the wonders that lie deep within the soil."

Soldevi Machinist

cards.flavor:

cards.name: Soldevi Steam Beast
cards.text:
Whenever Soldevi Steam Beast becomes tapped, target opponent gains 2 life.
{2}: Regenerate Soldevi Steam Beast.

Trample, haste
